articles.title: InSight's Final Selfie - NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory
articles.description: NASA's InSight lander took this final selfie on April 24, 2022. The lander is covered with far more dust than it was in its first selfie, taken in December 2018, or in its second selfie, taken in March and April of 2019.
